# OpenResty #


* /usr/local/openresty/

OpenRestyngx_openrestyNginxWebNginx OpenRestyNginx
OpenResty
OpenRestyluaNginxC


> * perl 5.6.1+
> * libreadline
> * libpcre
> * libssl

Debian  Ubuntu
```
apt-get install libreadline-dev libncurses5-dev libpcre3-dev libssl-dev perl make
```

Fedora RedHat  centos
```
yum install readline-devel pcre-devel openssl-devel gc-c++ -y
```

OpenResty
https://openresty.org/en/download.html
```
wget http://openresty.org/download/ngx_openresty-1.5.8.1.tar.gz
tar xzvf ngx_openresty-1.5.8.1.tar.gz
cd ngx_openresty-1.5.8.1/
./configure --with-luajit
make
make install
```

```
./configure --prefix=/opt/openresty 
--with-luajit 
--without-http_redis2_module 
--with-http_iconv_module 
--with-http_postgres_module 
-j2
--help to see more options
```
localhostnginx

 sshuttle  sshd -D  Its just data-over-TCP TCP-over-TCPTCP-over-TCP  TCP  TCP  TCP TCP

Post._content:
**[](http://www.ilanni.com/)**

# 
3.2

## yum
```
vim /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb.repo

[MongoDB]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=http://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.2/x86_64/
gpgcheck=0
enabled=1

yum -y install mongodb-org
/etc/init.d/mongod restart
chkconfig mongod on
mongod --version```

## 
```
wget http://fastdl.mongodb.org/linux/mongodb-linux-x86_64-rhel62-3.2.8.tgz

wget https://fossies.org/linux/misc/mongodb-linux-x86_64-3.2.8.tgz

tar -xf mongodb-linux-x86_64-rhel62-3.2.8.tgz -C /usr/local/    #
cd /usr/local/
mv mongodb-linux-x86_64-rhel62-3.2.8 mongodb
mkdir /usr/local/mongodb/data

vim /etc/profile
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/mongodb/bin

source /etc/profile
```

---
# 
## 
```
vim /usr/local/mongodb/mongodb.conf
#
port=27017
#
dbpath= /usr/local/mongodb/data
#
logpath= /usr/local/mongodb/mongodb.log
#
logappend=true
#
fork=true
#
maxConns=500
#
#bind_ip=127.0.0.1
#
#auth = true  #
```


## mongodb
```
/usr/local/mongodb/bin/mongod -f /usr/local/mongodb/mongodb.conf```

---
# 

**read**
**readWrite**
**dbAdmin**system.profile
**userAdmin**system.users
**clusterAdmin**admin
**readAnyDatabase**admin
**readWriteAnyDatabase**admin
**userAdminAnyDatabase**adminuserAdmin
**dbAdminAnyDatabase**admindbAdmin
**root**admin

## 
**admin****suadmin****ilannipasswd****dbAdminAnyDatabaseuserAdminAnyDatabase**
```
mongo
use admin
db.createUser({user:'suadmin',pwd:'ilannipasswd',roles:[{role:'dbAdminAnyDatabase',db:'admin'},{role:'userAdminAnyDatabase',db:'admin'}]})```

db.createUser({user:'suadmin',pwd:'ilannipasswd',roles:[{role:'dbAdminAnyDatabase',db:'admin'}]})```

mongodb**auth = true****mongodb**
```
pgrep -f mongodb |xargs kill -2

#
auth = true

#mongo
/usr/local/mongodb/bin/mongod -f /usr/local/mongodb/mongodb.conf


mongo localhost:27017/admin -u suadmin -p ilannipasswd
show users
show dbs
show collections```

db.createUser({user:'ilanniadmin',pwd:'ilanni123456',roles:[{role:'readWrite',db:'ilanni'}]})

# Ubuntu 16 #
ruby

ruby

 irb     
irb(main):001:0> 3+5
=> 8

hello world!

---

# Centos #
`yum list ruby `yum
```
yum install openssl* openssl-devel zlib-devel gcc gcc-c++ make autoconf readline-devel curl-devel expat-devel gettext-devel -y
```

iptablesSELINUX
```
service iptables stop
setenforce 0
vi /etc/sysconfig/selinux
SELINUX=disabled         #selinux  
```

```
wget http://ftp.ruby-lang.org/pub/ruby/2.3/ruby-2.3.1.tar.gz
tar zxvf ruby-2.3.1.tar.gz
cd ruby-2.3.1
./configure --enable-shared --enable-pthread --prefix=/usr/local/ruby
make && make install
```

ossl_pkey_ec.c:815: error: EC_GROUP_new_curve_GF2m' undeclared (first use in this function)
ssl
https://bugs.ruby-lang.org/projects/ruby-trunk/repository/revisions/41808

```
cd ruby-2.3.1
wget --no-check-certificate https://bugs.ruby-lang.org/projects/rubytrunk/repository/revisions/41808/raw/ext/openssl/ossl_pkey_ec.c
wget --no-check-certificate https://bugs.ruby-lang.org/projects/ruby-trunk/repository/revisions/41808/raw/test/openssl/test_pkey_ec.rb
mv ext/openssl/ossl_pkey_ec.c  ext/openssl/ossl_pkey_ec.c.bak
cp ossl_pkey_ec.c ext/openssl/
mv test/openssl/test_pkey_ec.rb test/openssl/test_pkey_ec.rb.bak
cp test_pkey_ec.rb  test/openssl/
```

`make && make install`

ruby
```
echo "PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/ruby/bin;export PATH" >> /etc/profile
source /etc/profile
```

`ruby -v`
`gem --version`

Post.title: Node.js
Post._content:
https://nodejs.org 
# MacWindows

**Source Code****linux** **bin****nodenpm** **/usr/local/bin/****node_modules**

---

# Ubuntu 16 CentOS 7 
## apt-get

```
apt install nodejs-legacy nodejs npm
```

## (root)
 
**6g++linux**

**gcc4.8**

Centos: **yum install g++ cmake gcc-c++ gmake -y**           

Ubuntu**apt-get install python build-essential gcc g++**   

```
git clone https://github.com/nodejs/node.git
chmod -R 755 node
cd node
./configure    #--prefix=/usr/local/node/
make
make install
```

**https://nodejs.org/en/download/**Nodejs**Source Code**`tar -zxvf filename` 

 node `node --version`

,nodejs
`vim /etc/profile`


```
	#set for nodejs
	#./configure/usr/local/node/
	export NODE_HOME=/usr/bin/node  	
	export PATH=$NODE_HOME/bin:$PATH
```

**/etc/profile** 

`source /etc/profile`



npm
**/usr/local/lib/node_modules**

**/usr/local/node//lib/node_modules**

---

#  NPM 
 npm  NPM 
 NPM  npmjs.org () 10 
**http://npm.taobao.org/**
## config

```
npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org
npm info underscore #response 
```

## 
`npm --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org info underscore` 

##  ~/.npmrc 
`registry = https://registry.npm.taobao.org`

 cnpm (gzip )  npm:
(cnpm,npm)
`npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org`

 cnpm 

`cnpm install [name]`


Node.js:
http://www.runoob.com/nodejs/nodejs-npm.html

Post.title: CentOS 7LAMP
Post._content:
# CentOS 7LAMP(Apache+PHP+MariaDB)

CentOSPHP,LAMPLNMPLNAMP
**http://www.centos.bz/2013/08/ezhttp-tutorial/**
 
## 
### 803306
CentOS 7firewalliptables
#### 1firewall
```
systemctl stop firewalld.service #firewall
systemctl disable firewalld.service #firewall```
#### 2iptables
```
yum install iptables-services #
vim /etc/sysconfig/iptables #```

```
-A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp --dport 3306 -j ACCEPT```
:wq! #
```
systemctl restart iptables #
systemctl enable iptables #```
### SELINUX
```
vim /etc/selinux/config
#SELINUX=enforcing #
#SELINUXTYPE=targeted #
SELINUX=disabled #```
:wq! #
`setenforce 0` #
---
## 
MariaDB
CentOS 7.0MariaDBMySQL
#### 1MariaDB
```
yum install mariadb mariadb-server -y
systemctl start mariadb #MariaDB```

`cp /usr/share/mysql/my-huge.cnf /etc/my.cnf` /etcmy.cnf
#### 2root
`mysql_secure_installation`

* Y
* 2
* Y
* Thanks for using MySQL!
* MariaDB MariaDB
`systemctl restart mariadb` #MariaDB

#### 3ApachePHP
```
yum install http php php-mysql php-gd libjpeg* php-ldap php-odbc php-pear php-xml php-xmlrpc php-mbstring php-bcmath php-mhash -y
systemctl restart mariadb  #MariaDB
systemctl enable mariadb #
systemctl start httpd #apache
systemctl enable httpd #apache```

IPapache

---

## :
### Apache
`vim /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf` 

* ServerSignature On  #ApacheOff
* Options Indexes FollowSymLinks  #Options Includes ExecCGI FollowSymLinksCGISSI
* #AddHandler cgi-script .cgi.plCGI
* AllowOverride None #AllowOverride All .htaccess
* AddDefaultCharset UTF-8#AddDefaultCharset GB2312GB2312
* #Options Indexes FollowSymLinks   # Options FollowSymLinks
* DirectoryIndex index.html   #DirectoryIndex index.html index.htm
* Default.html Default.htmindex.phpindex.php
* MaxKeepAliveRequests 500  #MaxKeepAliveRequests 500 

:wq! #
`systemctl restart httpd`apache
`rm -f /etc/httpd/conf.d/welcome.conf /var/www/error/noindex.html` 

---

### php
`vim /etc/php.ini` 

* date.timezone = PRC #date.timezone = PRC
* (PHP)
```
disable_functions = passthru,exec,system,chroot,scandir,chgrp,chown,shell_exec,proc_open,proc_get_status,ini_alter,ini_alter,ini_restore,dl,openlog,syslog,readlink,symlink,popepassthru,stream_socket_server,escapeshellcmd,dll,popen,disk_free_space,checkdnsrr,checkdnsrr,getservbyname,getservbyport,disk_total_space,posix_ctermid,posix_get_last_error,posix_getcwd, posix_getegid,posix_geteuid,posix_getgid, posix_getgrgid,posix_getgrnam,posix_getgroups,posix_getlogin,posix_getpgid,posix_getpgrp,posix_getpid, posix_getppid,posix_getpwnam,posix_getpwuid, posix_getrlimit, posix_getsid,posix_getuid,posix_isatty, posix_kill,posix_mkfifo,posix_setegid,posix_seteuid,posix_setgid, posix_setpgid,posix_setsid,posix_setuid,posix_strerror,posix_times,posix_ttyname,posix_uname 
```
* expose_php = Off #php
* short_open_tag = ON #php
* open_basedir = .:/tmp/  ((PHP)/tmp/,php,()/data/www.osyunwei.com/:/tmp/)
* 
:wq! #
```
systemctl restart mariadb #MariaDB
systemctl restart httpd #apache```

```cd /var/www/html
vim index.php #```
```php
<?php
phpinfo();
?>
```
:wq! #
IP

apache**/var/www/html**
`chown apache.apache -R /var/www/html`

http://www.osyunwei.com/archives/7829.html

sudo lokkit -s http -s ssh```

## GitLab,
```

curl -sS http://packages.gitlab.cc/install/gitlab-ce/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash
yum -y install gitlab-ce


vim /etc/yum.repos.d/gitlab-ce.repo
[gitlab-ce]
name=gitlab-ce
baseurl=http://mirrors.lifetoy.org/gitlab-ce/yum/el6
repo_gpgcheck=0
gpgcheck=0
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://packages.gitlab.com/gpg.key

yum -y install gitlab-ce


vim /etc/yum.repos.d/gitlab-ce.repo
[gitlab-ce]
name=gitlab-ce
baseurl=http://mirrors.lifetoy.org/gitlab-ce/yum/el6/
repo_gpgcheck=0
gpgcheck=0
enabled=1

yum -y install gitlab-ce

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


rpm -ivh https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/gitlab-ce/yum/el6/gitlab-ce-8.9.6-ce.0.el6.x86_64.rpm
#7.168.9.6


rpm -ivh http://mirrors.lifetoy.org/gitlab-ce/yum/el6/gitlab-ce-8.8.7-ce.1.el6.x86_64.rpm
```
gitlab-ce`rpm -ql gitlab-ce |more`

## gitLab
`sudo gitlab-ctl reconfigure`


---

# mysqlgitlab-ce
## yum
```
wget -P /etc/yum.repos.d  http://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-6.repo  #Centos7 
yum -y install mysql mysql-server mysql-devel gcc```

## mysql
root12345gitlab
```
/etc/init.d/mysqld start
/usr/bin/mysqladmin -u root password '12345gitlab'```

## gitlab
gitlabgitlab12345aa
```
mysql -uroot -p'12345gitlab'
create user 'gitlab'@'%' identified by 'gitlab12345aa';
set storage_engine=innodb;
create database if not exists `gitlabhq_production` default character set `utf8` collate `utf8_unicode_ci`;
grant select,insert,update,delete,create,create temporary tables,drop,index,alter,lock tables on `gitlabhq_production`.* to 'gitlab'@'%';```

## mysql
```
mysql -uroot -p'12345gitlab' mysql -e "delete from user where user='';flush privileges;"```

## gitlab
```
mysql -h127.0.0.1 -ugitlab -p'gitlab12345aa'```

gitlab`vim /etc/gitlab/gitlab.rb`
gitlab_rails['db_adapter'] = "mysql2"
gitlab_rails['db_encoding'] = "utf8"
gitlab_rails['db_database'] = "gitlabhq_production"
gitlab_rails['db_pool'] = 10
gitlab_rails['db_username'] = "gitlab"
gitlab_rails['db_password'] = "**gitlab12345aa**"
gitlab_rails['db_host'] = "127.0.0.1"
gitlab_rails['db_port'] = 3306
postgresql['enable'] = false

```
vim /opt/gitlab/embedded/service/gitlab-rails/.bundle/config```
---
BUNDLE_RETRY: 5
BUNDLE_PATH: "/opt/gitlab/embedded/service/gem"
BUNDLE_JOBS: 9
`BUNDLE_WITHOUT: development:test:postgres`
BUNDLE_DISABLE_SHARED_GEMS: '1'

```
cd /opt/gitlab/embedded/service/gitlab-rails
/opt/gitlab/embedded/bin/bundle install
gitlab-ctl reconfigure
gitlab-ctl restart
gitlab-rake gitlab:setup```
gitlab-cemysql

http://IP/ GitLab,,.
root,,

```
vim /etc/gitlab/gitlab.rb
external_url 'http://your.domain'```

`cat /opt/gitlab/embedded/service/gitlab-rails/VERSION`

/var/opt/gitlab/gitlab-workhorse

/var/opt/gitlab/nginx/conf/gitlab-http.conf

https://gitlab.com/larryli/gitlab
gitlab VERSION  8.13.5 
[](https://gitlab.com/larryli/gitlab/issues) issue
clone

### 
* 1.gitlab
`gitlab-ctl stop`
* 2.gitLab.com
`git clone https://gitlab.com/xhang/gitlab.git   #`

gitcafe.com
`git clone https://git.oschina.net/qiai365/gitlab-ce.git`

`git clone https://git.oschina.net/johnwu/gitlab-zh.git`

```
cd gitlab
git branch -a |tac```
![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/gitlab%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%99%A8%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA1.png)
8.88-8-stable8-8-zhdiff

### 
```
cd /opt/gitlab/embedded/service/gitlab-rails
git apply /tmp/8.8.diff```

gitlab`gitlab-ctl start`

## 
```
wget https://gitlab.com/larryli/gitlab/repository/archive.zip?ref=8-7-zh
unzip gitlab-8-7-zh-faeea0c584b042eaa433ed6c82335fe0c124af97.zip
cd gitlab-8-7-zh-faeea0c584b042eaa433ed6c82335fe0c124af97
sudo gitlab-ctl reconfigure
sudo gitlab-ctl restart```

---
# 
```
vim  /etc/gitlab/gitlab.rb
vim /opt/gitlab/embedded/service/gitlab-rails/config/environments/production.rb
vim /var/opt/gitlab/gitlab-rails/etc/smtp_settings.rb
vim /opt/gitlab/embedded/service/gitlab-rails/config/gitlab.yml
time_zone: Asia/Shanghai
vim /opt/gitlab/embedded/service/gitlab-rails/config/environments/development.rb```

* 1.`vim /etc/gitlab/gitlab.rb`
**/var/opt/gitlab/git-data**
`git_data_dir "/var/opt/gitlab/git-data"`

* 2.GitLab**group****devusers**
**/var/opt/gitlab/git-data****/var/opt/gitlab/git-data/devusers**
**/var/opt/gitlab/git-data/repositories/****devusers**

* 3.git
`cp -r /data/git/*  /var/opt/gitlab/git-data/devusers`

* 4.
`chown -R git:git /var/opt/gitlab/git-data/devusers`

```
cd /var/opt/gitlab
gitlab-rake gitlab:import:repos```

gitlab
```
/var/opt/gitlab/git-data/repositories
sudo vi /etc/gitlab/gitlab.rb
git_data_dir```

  • 4.

# Hexo Hexonode-jshexohexohtml https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/ ## Node.js https://nodejs.org [Node.js](http://leolan.top/2016/11/02/%E7%8E%AF%E5%A2%83%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA-2016-11-02-Node-js%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%AF%E5%A2%83%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA/) ## Hexo ``` npm install -g hexo-cli #Mac**sudo -i**root hexo init blog #blog cd blog npm install # hexo server # ``` `hexo server``hexo s``-p xxxx` jekyll**_config.yml**Hexo**_config.yml****_config.yml** ``` .deploy #hexo deployGitHub public #hexo generate scaffolds #layoutmd scripts #javascript source #markdownhtmlhexo404CNAME | _drafts # | _posts # themes # _config.yml # package.json #hexopushgithub*.jsondb.json ``` --- # Nexthttp://theme-next.iissnan.com/getting-started.html ## ``` # Hexo Configuration ## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.html ## Source: https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/ # Site title: Leo Lan subtitle: description: Better late than never author: LeoLan language: zh-Hans timezone: Asia/Shanghai # URL ## If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as 'http://yoursite.com/child' and root as '/child/' url: https://www.leolan.top coding_url: https://www.leolan.top root: / permalink: posts/:abbrlink/ permalink_defaults: # Directory source_dir: source public_dir: public tag_dir: tags archive_dir: archives category_dir: categories code_dir: downloads/code i18n_dir: :lang #README.mdymllayout: false--- skip_render: - baidu_verify_dc4dBM4StW.html - googled7e43f3624e0f703.html - CNAME - README.md - .nojekyll - Staticfile #.nojekyllsourcehexo g.5.0nextgithub include: - .nojekyll # abbrlink config SEO abbrlink: alg: crc16 # crc16(default) and crc32 rep: dec # dec(default) and hex baidu_url_submit: # count: 5 ## 3 host: www.leolan.top ## token: kZ5xboXBFPxQ0g7N ## ! path: /baidu_urls.txt ## # Writing https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/writing.html new_post_name: :year-:month-:day-:title.md # File name of new posts default_layout: post titlecase: false # Transform title into titlecase external_link: true # Open external links in new tab filename_case: 0 render_drafts: false post_asset_folder: false # relative_link: false future: true highlight: enable: true line_number: true auto_detect: true tab_replace: # Category & Tag default_category: uncategorized category_map: tag_map: # Date / Time format ## Hexo uses Moment.js to parse and display date ## You can customize the date format as defined in ## http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/ date_format: YYYY-MM-DD time_format: HH:mm:ss # Pagination 3 #npm install --save hexo-generator-index #npm install --save hexo-generator-archive #npm install --save hexo-generator-tag ## Set per_page to 0 to disable pagination index_generator: per_page: 5 archive_generator: per_page: 20 yearly: true monthly: true tag_generator: per_page: 10 pagination_dir: page # Extensions ## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/ ## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/ theme: next5.1 #theme: next0.4 # Deployment ## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html ## http://www.lxway.com/240950852.htm #githubcodingtypegit deploy: - type: git repo: git@git.coding.net:leolan/blog.git,master message: 'LeoLan updated{{now("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")}}' #commit - type: git repo: git@github.com:MyLeoLan/blog.git,master message: 'LeoLan updated{{now("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")}}' #deploy: #- type: git # repo: #- type: heroku # repo: # Disqus #Disqus disqus_shortname: leolan #plugins: # RSS #hexo-generator-sitemap #- hexo-generator-baidu-sitemap plugins: hexo-generator-feed hexo-generator-baidu-sitemap sitemap: path: sitemap.xml baidusitemap: path: baidusitemap.xml # Social links social: GitHub: https://github.com/myleolan Coding: https://coding.net/u/leolan CSDN: http://blog.csdn.net/lan842632 OSchina: https://my.oschina.net/leolan/blog #Twitter: https://twitter.com/lmintlcx #Zhihu: http://www.zhihu.com/people/lmintlcx #Douban: http://www.douban.com/people/lmintlcx #Weibo: http://weibo.com/u/3233729080 duoshuo_shortname: leolan # true false duoshuo_hotartical: true # duoshuo_share: true # baidushare: true # reward_comment: , alipay: http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//pay/alipay.jpg wechatpay: http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//pay/weixinpay.png # since: 2016 # baidu_analytics: dc0e85252eeff3a87aa87f35d92a8d33 # search: path: search.xml field: post format: html limit: 10000 ``` ## Nexthttp://theme-next.iissnan.com/ ``` cd your-hexo-site git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next``` next**_config.yml**`theme: next` `hexo clean && hexo s` **_config.yml** ``` # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Site Information Settings # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Put your favicon.ico into `hexo-site/source/` directory. favicon: /200.png # Set default keywords (Use a comma to separate) SEO keywords: "Hexo, NexT, Leo Lan, leolan, Blog, myleolan, lan, coding" # Set rss to false to disable feed link. # Leave rss as empty to use site's feed link. # Set rss to specific value if you have burned your feed already. rss: # Specify the date when the site was setup #since: 2015 # Canonical, set a canonical link tag in your hexo, you could use it for your SEO of blog. # See: https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/139066 # Tips: Before you open this tag, remeber set up your URL in hexo _config.yml ( ex. url: http://yourdomain.com ) canonical: true # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Menu Settings # --------------------------------------------------------------- # When running the site in a subdirectory (e.g. domain.tld/blog), remove the leading slash (/archives -> archives) menu: home: / categories: /categories tags: /tags archives: /archives about: /about guestbook: /guestbook # schedule: /schedule #commonweal: /404.html # Enable/Disable menu icons. # Icon Mapping: # Map a menu item to a specific FontAwesome icon name. # Key is the name of menu item and value is the name of FontAwsome icon. Key is case-senstive. # When an question mask icon presenting up means that the item has no mapping icon. menu_icons: #http://fontawesome.io/icons/ enable: true #KeyMapsToMenuItemKey: NameOfTheIconFromFontAwesome home: home about: user categories: th schedule: calendar tags: tags archives: archive commonweal: heartbeat guestbook: commenting # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Scheme Settings # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Schemes #scheme: Muse #scheme: Mist scheme: Pisces # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Font Settings # - Find fonts on Google Fonts (https://www.google.com/fonts) # - All fonts set here will have the following styles: # light, light italic, normal, normal intalic, bold, bold italic # - Be aware that setting too much fonts will cause site running slowly # - Introduce in 5.0.1 # --------------------------------------------------------------- font: enable: true # Uri of fonts host. E.g. //fonts.googleapis.com (Default) fonts.googleapis.com host: fonts.css.network # Global font settings used on element. global: # external: true will load this font family from host. external: true family: Lato # Font settings for Headlines (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6) # Fallback to `global` font settings. headings: external: true family: # Font settings for posts # Fallback to `global` font settings. posts: external: true family: # Font settings for Logo # Fallback to `global` font settings. # The `size` option use `px` as unit logo: external: true family: size: # Font settings for and code blocks. codes: external: true family: size: # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Sidebar Settings # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Social Links # Key is the link label showing to end users. # Value is the target link (E.g. GitHub: https://github.com/iissnan) #social: #LinkLabel: Link # Social Links Icons # Icon Mapping: # Map a menu item to a specific FontAwesome icon name. # Key is the name of the item and value is the name of FontAwsome icon. Key is case-senstive. # When an globe mask icon presenting up means that the item has no mapping icon. social_icons: enable: true # Icon Mappings. # KeyMapsToSocalItemKey: NameOfTheIconFromFontAwesome GitHub: github Twitter: twitter Weibo: weibo # Sidebar Avatar # in theme directory(source/images): /images/avatar.jpg # in site directory(source/uploads): /uploads/avatar.jpg avatar: /images/avatar.jpg # # Table Of Contents in the Sidebar toc: enable: true # Automatically add list number to toc. number: true # Creative Commons 4.0 International License. # http://creativecommons.org/ # Available: by | by-nc | by-nc-nd | by-nc-sa | by-nd | by-sa | zero #creative_commons: by-nc-sa #creative_commons: sidebar: # Sidebar Position, available value: left | right position: left #position: right # Sidebar Display, available value: # - post expand on posts automatically. Default. # - always expand for all pages automatically # - hide expand only when click on the sidebar toggle icon. # - remove Totally remove sidebar including sidebar toggler. display: post #display: always #display: hide #display: remove # Blogrolls links_title: #links_layout: block links_icon: heartbeat #links_layout: inline links: Jerry Locke: https://jerry.hk/ # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Misc Theme Settings # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Custom Logo. # !!Only available for Default Scheme currently. # Options: # enabled: [true/false] - Replace with specific image # image: url-of-image - Images's url custom_logo: enabled: false image: # Code Highlight theme # Available value: # normal | night | night eighties | night blue | night bright # https://github.com/chriskempson/tomorrow-theme highlight_theme: night eighties # Automatically scroll page to section which is under mark. scroll_to_more: true # Automatically Excerpt. Not recommand. # Please use in the post to control excerpt accurately. auto_excerpt: enable: true length: 150 # Wechat Subscriber #wechat_subscriber: #enabled: true #qcode: /path/to/your/wechatqcode ex. /uploads/wechat-qcode.jpg #description: ex. subscribe to my blog by scanning my public wechat account # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Third Party Services Settings # --------------------------------------------------------------- # MathJax Support mathjax: enable: false cdn: //cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML # # Swiftype Search API Key #swiftype_key: # Baidu Analytics ID #baidu_analytics: # Duoshuo ShortName #duoshuo_shortname: # Disqus #disqus_shortname: # Baidu Share # Available value: # button | slide # Warning: Baidu Share does not support https. #baidushare: ## type: button # Share jiathis: true # Warning: JiaThis does not support https. #add_this_id: # Share duoshuo_share: true # Google Webmaster tools verification setting # See: https://www.google.com/webmasters/ #google_site_verification: # Google Analytics #google_analytics: # CNZZ count #cnzz_siteid: # Make duoshuo show UA # user_id must NOT be null when admin_enable is true! Post.title: Tomcat
Post._content:
# tomcat
JDKgccautomake
[java jdk](http://www.leolan.top/posts/59/)

tomcathttp://tomcat.apache.org/download-90.cgi

---
## 
**/usr/local/tomcat**/opt
![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/tomcat001.png)
```
cd /usr/local
wget http://mirrors.hust.edu.cn/apache/tomcat/tomcat-9/v9.0.0.M13/bin/apache-tomcat-9.0.0.M13.tar.gz
tar zxvf apache-tomcat-9.0.0.M13.tar.gz
mv apache-tomcat-9.0.0.M13 tomcat
```

---
## 
```
cd /tomcat/bin/
tar zxvf commons-daemon-native.tar.gz
#commons-daemon-X.X.XX-native-src
cd commons-daemon-1.0.10-native-src/unix
./configure
make     #jsvc
cp jsvc /usr/local/tomcat/bin
```
**./configure**(jdkjdk)**./configure \--with-java=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.111-0.b15.el6_8.x86_64**(JAVA_HOME)JDK

---
## 

`/usr/bin/vim /etc/profile`

`vim /etc/profile`**tomcat****/tomcat/bin**
**export**
```
export CATALINA_HOME=/usr/local/tomcat/
export PATH=$CATALINA_HOME/bin  #PATH,":"```

```
CATALINA_HOME=/usr/local/tomcat/   #
PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin:$JRE_HOME/bin:$CATALINA_HOME/bin   #:$CATALINA_HOME/bin
export JAVA_HOME JRE_HOME CLASS_PATH PATH CATALINA_HOME      #CATALINA_HOME
```
![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/tomcat002.png)
`source /etc/profile``. /etc/profile`

---
## 
tomcat/bindaemon.sh **tomcat**

tomcat,tomcat 6.0.x, , **commons-daemon-x.x.x-native-src/unix/samples/Tomcat7.sh**Tomcat5.shtomcatbin**daemon.sh**tomcat 6Tomcat7.shbindaemon.sh

daemon`cd /usr/local/tomcat/bin && vim ./daemon.sh`
**TOMCAT_USER=tomcat**linux,tomcat()**JAVA_HOME=...**#jdk
![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/tomcat003.png)

```
useradd -M tomcat                   #tomcat
chsh tomcat -s /sbin/nologin        #tomcatwindows
chown -R tomcat /usr/local/tomcat   #/usr/local/tomcattomcat
chmod +x /usr/local/tomcat/bin/*.sh #tomcat/bin/*.shx
```

---
## 

```
vim /etc/sysconfig/iptables
#22-A INPUT -j REJECT
-A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp --dport 8080 -j ACCEPT   #tomcat8080
service iptables restart   #
cd /usr/local/tomcat/bin
./startup.sh                 #tomcat
./daemon.sh  start           #
curl http://localhost:8080   #
```
daemon.shtomcatbin*.shxlinuxtomcattomcat/logs


**tomcatLinux**/etc/init.d/
```
ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/bin/daemon.sh /etc/init.d/tomcat
#tomcat
/etc/init.d/tomcat  start #tomcat
service tomcat start      #tomcat
/etc/init.d/tomcat  stop  #tomcat
service tomcat stop       #tomcat```

---
**tomcat**
1.**daemon.sh**
```
#!/bin/sh      #2,#
# chkconfig: 2345 90 15
# description: Tomcat-en Manager```
 chkconfigtomcat(**tomcatLinux**)
```
chkconfig --add tomcat```


2.**/etc/rc.d/rc.local**
/etc/rc.d/rc.local
```
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.111-0.b15.el6_8.x86_64
/usr/local/tomcat/bin/startup.sh start

export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.111-0.b15.el6_8.x86_64
/usr/local/tomcat/bin/catalina.sh start
```
`chmod +x /etc/rc.d/rc.local`

catalina.sh[catalina.sh](http://www.cnblogs.com/huzhiwei/archive/2012/03/13/2393393.html)

---
tomcat/usr/local/tomcat
```
cp /usr/local/tomcat /usr/local/tomcat1```

tomcat1(**/usr/local/tomcat/opt/tomcat1/conf/server.xml**)"****"tomcat1OK
LinuxtomcatNginxApachetomcat



[LinuxApacheTomcat ](http://www.linuxidc.com/Linux/2012-01/51731.htm)

[Nginx Tomcat ](http://www.linuxidc.com/Linux/2013-07/86827.htm)

[Tomcat+NginxTomcat+Apachemod_jkmod_proxy](http://www.linuxidc.com/Linux/2013-06/85290.htm)

---

# Jekyll JekyllRubyjekyllgithub 1. rubyruby2.2.2[Ruby](http://leolan.top/2016/10/31/%E7%8E%AF%E5%A2%83%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA-2016-10-21-Ruby%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%AF%E5%A2%83%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA/) 2. kramdownMarkdown gem install kramdown 3. rouge gem install rouge 4. exec gem install execjs 5. rubyBundler gem install bundler 6. rails WEBjekyll gem install rails 7.JekyllMac gem install jekyll gems **Mac** ``` mkdir -p /usr/local/Cellar/ruby/bin sudo gem install jekyll -n /usr/local/Cellar/ruby/bin``` **jekyll** `/Users//.bash_profile`Jekyll `export PATH=/usr/local/Cellar/ruby/bin:$PATH`Jekyllok `whereis gem`**/usr/bin/gem**,gem**gem**JekyllJekyllpermission deniedsymlinksudopermission deniedJekyll **Windows** jekyllbundle ![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/%E7%94%A8Jekyll%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A201.png) http://rubyinstaller.org/downloads/ **DevKit-mingw** 1. cmd 2. `ruby dk.rb init` 3. **config.yml** `- C:\Ruby23-x64 #ruby` ![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/%E7%94%A8Jekyll%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A202.png) 4. `ruby dk.rb review #` 5. `ruby dk.rb install` 6. **info****warning** 7. `gem install json --platform=ruby`devkit 8. rubyruby-devkit2.0.0rubyhttps://rubygems.org/pages/download gem ok, --- # ``` jekyll new new-site # cd new-site # jekyll serve --watch #--watchjekyll jekyll build #``` localhost:4000blog **Could not find a JavaScript runtime.** **gemfile** ``` gem 'execjs' gem 'therubyracer' ``` `gem install therubyracer ` Jekyll ``` _config.yml # _drafts # | begin-with-the-crazy-ideas.textile | on-simplicity-in-technology.markdown _includes # {\% include file.ext \%} _includes/file.ext | footer.html #HTML | header.html #HTML _layouts | default.html # | post.html # _posts # | XXXX.md | XXXXXX.md _data | members.yml _site # index.html #index Other Files/Folders # css images favicon.ico site ``` **_config.yml** http://jekyll.com.cn/ http://pwnny.cn/original/2016/06/26/MakeBlog.html _posts**YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.md** YAMLYAML front- matter ``` --- layout: post title: "" date: 2016/10/26 13:03:42 categories: tag: ,jekyll --- Markdown ``` ymlRakefile**yml.md**404 --- # ## http://jekyllthemes.org/HuxforkHuxhttps://github.com/huxpro/huxpro.github.io/ ## ``` # tab , #http://jekyllcn.com/docs/configuration/#front-matter-defaults # Site settings title: LeoLan author: Leo Lan email: 842632422@qq.com description: > # this means to ignore newlines until "baseurl:" Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description. # #webrick: # headers: # My-Header: My-Value # My-Other-Header: My-Other-Value # Site URL NOTE: if your site is base on subdir /blog you should change base to "/blog" domain: "http://myleolan.github.io" #github the domain URL for your site base: "" # the relative path that different with domain so you can test locally # Source URL NOTE: end with / cause it's [URL + FILE] w3c_url: "/w3c/" # the base url of css js and images postImage_url: "/w3c/images/" # the base url of post images postfile: "/db/Postfile" # the Database sitefile: "/db/Sitefile" # the Database # 3rd URL duoshuo_short_name: "leolan" # the user of user.domain.com duoshuo_user_uid: "a61c3f290749b621688a3f42c7e8e31c" #uid the admin user uid duoshuo_user_name: "leolan" # the admin user names duoshuo_max_depth: "2" # the max_depth setting in duoshuo comments duoshuo_url: "/w3c/duoshuo/embed.min.js" # the local duoshuo comment plugin, you can change it to remote "http://static.duoshuo.com/" jquery_url: "http://cdn.bootcss.com/jquery/3.1.0/jquery.min.js" # use cdn baiduTemplate_url: "/w3c/js/baiduTemplate.js" #use local google_analytics_id: "UA-86334360-1" #Google # Build Settings excerpt_separator: "\n\n" # you can specify your own separator here, default is "\n\n" String permalink: /:year/:month/:day/:title.html #html highlighter: rouge # markdown: kramdown #markdown kramdown: input: GFM hard_wrap: true # a newline in markdown text would be changed to
# gems: - jemoji lsi: BOOL # ####--------------------------------------------------------------------- #github # Following is got in Github Help With Configuring Jekyll # Github Page Default Settings which you can override: # kramdown: # input: GFM # hard_wrap: false # gems: # - jekyll-coffeescript # - jekyll-paginate # Github Page override the following settings which you cannot change: # lsi: false # safe: true # # source: [your repo's top level directory] # incremental: false # highlighter: rouge # gist: # noscript: false # kramdown: # math_engine: mathjax ``` ## yml ``` --- layout: post title: "" date: 2016/10/26 13:03:42 categories: tag: ,jekyll ---``` Rakefileruby ``` task :default => :new require 'fileutils' desc " post" task :new do puts ".md" @url = STDIN.gets.chomp puts " " @name = STDIN.gets.chomp puts " " @subtitle = STDIN.gets.chomp puts " " @categories = STDIN.gets.chomp puts " " @tag = STDIN.gets.chomp @slug = "#{@url}" @slug = @slug.downcase.strip.gsub(' ', '-') @date = Time.now.strftime("%F") @post_name = "_posts/#{@date}-#{@slug}.md" if File.exist?(@post_name) abort("") end FileUtils.touch(@post_name) open(@post_name, 'a') do |file| file.puts "---" file.puts "layout: post" file.puts "title: #{@name}" file.puts "subtitle: #{@subtitle}" file.puts "author: Leo Lan" file.puts "date: #{Time.now}" file.puts "categories: #{@categories}" file.puts "tag: #{@tag}" file.puts "published: true" file.puts "---" end exec "vim #{@post_name}" end``` **layout**posttitle **date** **subtitle** **categories**html_site/jekyll/updatehtmljekyll**tag** **published** `rake new` http://www.liubaicai.net/articles/733/ --- # Github Pages Github Pages ## Github username username.github.io username **master** ![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/%E7%94%A8Jekyll%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A203.png) http://username.github.io/ GithubJekyll username username.github.io master index.html ## Github username blog **gh-pages ** http://username.github.io/blog Github username project gh-pages * username.github.io master * blog gh-pages ReadMe.md4[git](https://www.leolan.top/posts/41310/) ![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/%E7%94%A8Jekyll%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A204.png) **Launch automatic page generator** ![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/%E7%94%A8Jekyll%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A205.png) **Continue to layouts** **Publish page**Github Pagesgh-pages ![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/%E7%94%A8Jekyll%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A206.png) https://myleolan.github.io/blog/ jekyll bundlegh-pagesgithubWindows Hexo # Github Pages JekyllpushGithub PagesGithub PagesGithub Pages ruby2.0.0`ruby --version`2.0.0ruby rubyBundler ``` gem install bundler bundler -v``` jekyll ``` git init # git checkout -b gh-pages #gh-pagesgithubgh-pages``` **Gemfile** GemfileGemfile.lock ``` source 'https://ruby.taobao.org' #() gem 'github-pages', group: :jekyll_plugins source 'https://rubygems.org' #() gem 'github-pages', group: :jekyll_plugins``` Github Pages**Gemfile** `bundle install` fork `bundle exec jekyll serve` **bundle exec jekyll serve****jekyll serve**GemfileGemfile.lockjekyll serve Github Pages:https://help.github.com/articles/setting-up-your-github-pages-site-locally-with-jekyll/ **.git** Github 1. markdown_posts 2. `jekyll serve watch``bundle exec jekyll server`(**_config.yml**`port: xxxx`) 1. git 2. --- # * 1 **CNAME**** leolan.top****CNAME**pages**leolan.top****www.leolan.top**, * 2 CNAME@wwwCNAME `username.github.io. ` io Coding ![](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com//blog/%E5%9F%9F%E5%90%8D%E7%BB%91%E5%AE%9A.png) **CNAME** ---

Post._content:
# 


**Git-osx-install**https://sourceforge.net/projects/git-osx-installer/

---
**Homebrew - Mac OSX **
```
ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/go/install)"```

---
**XCode **


---
**wget**
```
brew install wget```
 brew edit wget 

---
**[Oh-my-zsh](https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh)**
```
wget --no-check-certificate https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/raw/master/tools/install.sh -O - | sh```

`uninstall_oh_my_zsh`

[ ShellZSH](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/19556676?columnSlug=mactalk)

**autojump**
zsh  autojump  zsh 
Mac`brew install autojump`
Linux
```
wget https://github.com/downloads/joelthelion/autojump/autojump_v21.1.2.tar.gz
tar zxvf autojump_v21.1.2.tar.gz
cd autojump_v21.1.2
./install.sh```


`vim ~/.zshrc`
```
[[ -s ~/.autojump/etc/profile.d/autojump.sh ]] && . ~/.autojump/etc/profile.d/autojump.sh```

## ssh

```

Post._content:
# Centos Mini
Centos mini

 
`yum update `

 
```
yum install gcc gcc-c++ make automake cmake libtool bison flex perl git subversion mercurial -y ```

 
```
yum install readline-devel bzip2-devel zlib-devel libxml2-devel libxslt-devel openssl-devel kernel-devel pcre-devel boost-devel python-devel python-setuptools libpcap-devel -y ```

 
```
yum install wget vim lsof lrzsz tcpdump -y ```

 
```
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp dport 80 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp dport 8080 -j ACCEPT 
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp dport 3306 -j ACCEPT  #ACCEPT DROP```

`/etc/init.d/iptables save`

`service iptables restart`

---
# centos6.X
## 
`vi /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0` ,
****

```
#
DEVICE=eth0
BOOTPROTO=static
ONBOOT=yes
IPADDR=221.4.223.114
NETMASK=255.255.255.224  
GATEWAY=221.4.xxx.xxx
DNS1=221.5.88.88
DNS2=8.8.8.8
#
vi /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth1
DEVICE=eth1
BOOTPROTO=static
ONBOOT=yes
IPADDR=192.168.0.114
NETMASK=255.255.252.0  
GATEWAY=192.168.0.1
#DNS1=221.5.88.88
#DNS2=8.8.8.8   DNS

#DNS
vim /etc/resolv.conf
nameserver 221.5.88.88
nameserver 8.8.8.8
IPV6INIT=no                 #IPV6

service ip6tables stop      #IPV6
chkconfig ip6tables off     #IPV6
service yum-updatesd stop   #
chkconfig yum-updatesd off  #
service network restart     #
ifconfig                    #IP```

## 
```
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp dport 80 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp dport 8080 -j ACCEPT 
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp dport 3306 -j ACCEPT  #ACCEPT DROP```

`/etc/init.d/iptables save`

`service iptables restart`

## 
```
vi /etc/sysconfig/network
vi /etc/hosts
hostname newname   #newname

service network restart    /etc/network restart
yum install wget lrzsz -y
service sshd start
chkconfig sshd on
shutdown -r now #```

---
# Ubuntu14.04
## 
Ubunturoot`sudo passwd root`root
```
apt-get install wget lrzsz openssh-server vim -y
/etc/init.d/ssh start```

## rootshell
Ubunturootswitch userroot
root`sudo passwd root`root
```
vim etc/ssh/sshd_config
PermitRootLogin yes
sudo service sshd restart```

## 

IP`sudo vi /etc/network/interfaces`
```shell
#
auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

ifconfig   #eth0
auto eth0   eno0eno1
iface eth0 inet static
address 221.4.xxx.xxx
gateway 221.4.xxx.xxx
netmask 255.255.255.xxx
dns-nameservers 221.5.88.88
dns-nameservers 8.8.8.8
auto eth1
iface eth1 inet static
address 192.168.0.254
netmask 255.255.252.0
#gateway 192.168.0.1```
,
```
/etc/init.d/networking restart```

## DHCP 
```
sudo vi /etc/network/interfaces
   auto eth0
   iface eth0 inet dhcp```
`/etc/init.d/networking restart`

## DNS

```
vi /etc/network/interfaces

dns-nameservers 221.5.88.88
dns-nameservers 8.8.8.8```


```
vi /etc/resolvconf/resolv.conf.d/head

dns-nameservers 221.5.88.88
dns-nameservers 8.8.8.8```


## 
```
resolvconf -u
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -i eth0 --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp dport 80 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp dport 8080 -j ACCEPT 
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp dport 3306 -j ACCEPT  #ACCEPT DROP```

`/etc/init.d/iptables save`

`service iptables restart`

## 
```
vi /etc/hostname
vi /etc/hosts
hostname newname  #newname

/etc/init.d/networking restart
shutdown -r now   #```

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get dist-upgrade```

```
sudo apt-get install update-manager-core  
sudo do-release-upgrade -d    sudo update-manager -d```

# 

**UbuntuDebian**
[](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com/blog/20161121/172019083.sh)

YES
server_portpassword
server_port443,80
password

`name.sh uninstall`
`name.sh update`
shadowsocks**/etc/shadowsocks-libev/config.json**
```
/etc/init.d/shadowsocks-libev stop
/etc/init.d/shadowsocks-libev start```

```
#! /bin/bash
#===============================================================================================
#   System Required:  Debian or Ubuntu (32bit/64bit)
#   Description:  Install Shadowsocks(libev) for Debian or Ubuntu
#   Author: tennfy <admin@tennfy.com>
#   Intro:  http://www.tennfy.com
#===============================================================================================

clear
echo "#############################################################"
echo "# Install Shadowsocks(libev) for Debian or Ubuntu (32bit/64bit)"
echo "# Intro: http://www.tennfy.com"
echo "#"
echo "# Author: tennfy <admin@tennfy.com>"
echo "#"
echo "#############################################################"
echo ""

function check_sanity {
	# Do some sanity checking.
	if [ $(/usr/bin/id -u) != "0" ]
	then
		die 'Must be run by root user'
	fi

	if [ ! -f /etc/debian_version ]
	then
		die "Distribution is not supported"
	fi
}

function die {
	echo "ERROR: $1" > /dev/null 1>&2
	exit 1
}

############################### install function##################################
function install_shadowsocks_tennfy(){
cd $HOME

# install
apt-get update
apt-get install -y --force-yes build-essential autoconf libtool libssl-dev git curl asciidoc xmlto libpcre3 libpcre3-dev

#download source code
git clone https://github.com/madeye/shadowsocks-libev.git

#compile install
cd shadowsocks-libev
./configure --prefix=/usr
make && make install
mkdir -p /etc/shadowsocks-libev
cp ./debian/shadowsocks-libev.init /etc/init.d/shadowsocks-libev
cp ./debian/shadowsocks-libev.default /etc/default/shadowsocks-libev
chmod +x /etc/init.d/shadowsocks-libev

# Get IP address(Default No.1)
IP=`curl -s checkip.dyndns.com | cut -d' ' -f 6  | cut -d'<' -f 1`
if [ -z $IP ]; then
   IP=`curl -s ifconfig.me/ip`
fi

#config setting
echo "#############################################################"
echo "#"
echo "# Please input your shadowsocks server_port and password"
echo "#"
echo "#############################################################"
echo ""
echo "input server_port(443 is suggested):"
read serverport
echo "input password:"
read shadowsockspwd

# Config shadowsocks
cat > /etc/shadowsocks-libev/config.json<<-EOF
{
    "server":"${IP}",
    "server_port":${serverport},
    "local_port":1080,
    "password":"${shadowsockspwd}",
    "timeout":60,
    "method":"rc4-md5"
}
EOF

#restart
/etc/init.d/shadowsocks-libev start

#start with boot
update-rc.d shadowsocks-libev defaults

#install successfully
    echo ""
    echo "Congratulations, shadowsocks-libev install completed!"
    echo -e "Your Server IP: ${IP}"
    echo -e "Your Server Port: ${serverport}"
    echo -e "Your Password: ${shadowsockspwd}"
    echo -e "Your Local Port: 1080"
    echo -e "Your Encryption Method:rc4-md5"
}
############################### uninstall function##################################
function uninstall_shadowsocks_tennfy(){
#change the dir to shadowsocks-libev
cd $HOME
cd shadowsocks-libev

#stop shadowsocks-libev process
/etc/init.d/shadowsocks-libev stop

#uninstall shadowsocks-libev
make uninstall
make clean
cd ..
rm -rf shadowsocks-libev

# delete config file
rm -rf /etc/shadowsocks-libev

# delete shadowsocks-libev init file
rm -f /etc/init.d/shadowsocks-libev
rm -f /etc/default/shadowsocks-libev

#delete start with boot
update-rc.d -f shadowsocks-libev remove

echo "Shadowsocks-libev uninstall success!"

}

############################### update function##################################
function update_shadowsocks_tennfy(){
     uninstall_shadowsocks_tennfy
     install_shadowsocks_tennfy
	 echo "Shadowsocks-libev update success!"
}
############################### Initialization##################################
# Make sure only root can run our script
check_sanity

action=$1
[  -z $1 ] && action=install
case "$action" in
install)
    install_shadowsocks_tennfy
    ;;
uninstall)
    uninstall_shadowsocks_tennfy
    ;;
update)
    update_shadowsocks_tennfy
    ;;	
*)
    echo "Arguments error! [${action} ]"
    echo "Usage: `basename $0` {install|uninstall|update}"
    ;;
esac```

Centos80
`lsof -i tcp:80`
 
 
`netstat -ntlp`
 
### 180 
* 
`/sbin/iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT `

	`/etc/init.d/iptables save`   

	`service iptables restart`    
 
* 
`vim /etc/sysconfig/iptables`  :

`-A INPUT -p tcp -m state --state NEW -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT` 
 

### 2

`/etc/init.d/iptables save `  

`service iptables restart `   
 
*

`-A INPUT -p tcp -m state --state NEW -m tcp --dport 80 -j DROP`

```
yum install ncurses-devel -y
yum install hmaccalc zlib-devel binutils-devel elfutils-libelf-devel -y
wget https://www.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v3.x/linux-3.10.28.tar.xz     
tar -xf linux-3.10.28.tar.xz
mv linux-3.10.28 /usr/src/
cd /usr/src/linux-3.10.28/
cp /boot/config-2.6.32-573.el6.x86_64 .config
#(uname -r)config
sh -c 'yes "" | make oldconfig'
make oldconfig```

cpu `cat /proc/cpuinfo| grep "processor"| wc -l `  **-j**48cpu
```
make -j48 bzImage
make -j48 modules
make -j48 modules_install
make install```

Post.title: Linux
Post._content:
**.sh**[](http://ofyfogrgx.bkt.clouddn.com/blog/20161118/175652134.sh)

```shell
#!/bin/bash
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:~/bin
export PATH

if [ $(cat /etc/issue |grep -v Kernel |awk '{print $1}') != "CentOS" ]; then
    apt-get install smartmontools -y
fi

echo ""
echo "---------------------------------------------"
echo ""`dmidecode|grep "System Information" -A9 | grep Manufacturer |awk '{print $2}'`
echo ""`dmidecode|grep "System Information" -A9 | grep Product |awk '{print $3}'`
echo ""`dmidecode|grep "System Information" -A9 | grep Serial |awk '{print $3}'`
echo ""
echo ""
echo "-----------------------------------------------"
b=`dmidecode|grep "System Information" -A9|egrep Manufacturer: |awk '{print $2}'`
echo "" $b
c=`dmidecode |grep "System Information" -A9 |grep "Product Name:" |awk '{print $3}'`
echo "" $c
echo ""
echo ""
echo "--------------------------------------------"
echo "" `cat /etc/issue |grep -v Kernel`
echo "" `uname -n`
echo "" `uname -r`
echo "" 
echo "----------------------CPU--------------------------"
echo "CPU" `cat /proc/cpuinfo| grep "physical id"| sort| uniq| wc -l`
echo "CPU" `cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep 'model name' |uniq |awk -F : '{print $2}'`
echo "CPU" `cat /proc/cpuinfo| grep "cpu cores"| uniq |awk '{print $4}'`
echo "CPU" `cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep "physical id" | uniq | wc -l`
echo "CPU" `cat /proc/cpuinfo| grep "processor"| wc -l`
echo ""
echo ""
echo "-----------------------------------------------"
echo "" `dmidecode |grep -A16 "Memory Device$" |grep Manufacturer: | wc -l`
echo "" `dmidecode |grep -A16 "Memory Device$" |grep 'Manufacturer: NO DIMM' | wc -l`
echo ""
	dmidecode -t memory |grep Manufacturer
echo ""
	dmidecode -t memory |grep 'Part Number'
echo ""
	dmidecode|grep -A5 "Memory Device"|grep Size|grep -v Range
echo ""
	dmidecode|grep -A16 "Memory Device"|grep Speed
echo "GB" `free -g |grep Mem |awk '{print $2}'`
echo ""
echo ""
echo "-----------------------------------------------"
echo "" `smartctl -a /dev/sda |egrep "Device Model:|Serial Number:"`
echo "" `fdisk -l |grep "Disk /dev/sd"`
echo ""
echo ""
echo "-----------------------------------------------"
echo ""
lspci | grep Ethernet
echo ""
echo ""

```

Post.title: Linuxroot
Post._content:
root

---
# RedHat/CentOS/Fedora
1.grub**E**
2.kernel **S **(Single)
3.B**single-user mode**
4.
```
mount -t proc proc /proc
mount -o remount,rw /
passwd
sync
reboot```

---
# Debian linux
1.grub**Debian GNU/Linux,(recovery mode)**e
2.kernel **ro single**  **rw single init=/bin/bash****b**
3.
```
mount -a
passwd root
reboot```

---
# Freebsd 
1.
2.**(4)**
3.
```
mount -a
fsck -y
passwd   #()
root     #()
#Enter new unix password:
init 6   #()```

---
# Solaris 
1.grub**solaris failasfe** 
2.Do you wish to have it mounted read-write on /a ?[y,n,?] y
3.
4.:`passwd`
5.`init 6` ()

---
# NetBsd 
1. 
> **boot -s **()
2.
Enter pathname of shell or RETURN for sh:
 Enter
3.
```
mount -a
fsck -y```
4. `passwd`  root 
5. `exit` 

---
# SUSE 
1.grublinux**init=/bin/bash**init=/bin/bashOSloginbash
2.(none)#:****
3.`mount -n / -o remount,rw` mountpasswd
4.`passwd`
5.`mount -n / -o remount,ro`

Post.title: Docker
Post._content:
DockerDocker
Docker  http://www.docker.org.cn

# docker

## docker  
`docker version`
## docker  
`docker info ` 

# image
## image  
`docker search image_name  `
## image  
`docker pull image_name   `
##   
`docker images `

* -a, --all=false Show all images; 
* --no-trunc=false Don't truncate output; 
* -q, --quiet=false Only show numeric IDs 

##   
`docker rmi image_name`

:
-f, --force=false Force; 
--no-prune=false Do not delete untagged parents  

##  
`docker history image_name`

--no-trunc=false Don't truncate output; 
-q, --quiet=false Only show numeric IDs  

# 

dockershell 


## "echo""hello word"  
`docker run image_name echo "hello word" ` 

##   
`docker run -i -t image_name /bin/bash  `
  
##   
`docker run image_name apt-get install -y app_name ` 

Note  **Ubuntuapt-get -y-yapt-getdocker**apt-get 

# ps
## container  
`docker ps ` 
## container  
`docker ps -a  `
## container  
`docker ps -l ` 

# commit

## 
`docker commit ID new_image_name `

* -a, --author="" Author; 
* -m, --message="" Commit message  

Note  imagecontainercontainercommitimage

# 
##  
	docker rm `docker ps -a -q`
rmi    
## 
`docker rm Name/ID  `

* **-f, --force=false** 
* **-l, --link=false** Remove the specified link and not the underlying container; 
* **-v, --volumes=false** Remove the volumes associated to the container  

##   
```
docker stop Name/ID  
docker start Name/ID  
docker kill Name/ID  ```
  
## 
`docker logs Name/ID ` 

* **-f, --follow=false** Follow log output; 
* **-t, --timestamps=false** Show timestamps  
 
## 
`docker diff Name/ID  `
listA D C 

##   
`docker top Name/ID  `
  
## /  
`docker cp Name:/container_path to_path ` 

`docker cp ID:/container_path to_path  `

## 
`docker restart Name/ID ` 

* **-t, --time=10** Number of seconds to try to stop for before killing the container, Default=10  

##  
`docker attach ID ` 

* **--no-stdin=false** Do not attach stdin; 
* **--sig-proxy=true** Proxify all received signal to the process  

Note attachattachCTRL-C


# saveload

## tar
`docker save image_name -o file_path`

* **-o, --output=""** Write to an file  
  
## tar
`docker load -i file_path ` 

* **-i, --input=""** Read from a tar archive file  
 
## AB
a  
`docker save image_name > /home/save.tar ` 
scpsave.tarb  
`docker load < /home/save.tar  `

# registry serverlogin
## registry server
`docker login`  

* **-e, --email=""** Email; 
* **-p, --password=""** Password; 
* **-u, --username=""** Username  

# imagepush
## docker  
`docker push new_image_name  `

# Dockerfile 
## build  
`docker build -t image_name Dockerfile_path`  

* **--no-cache=false** Do not use cache when building the image
* **-q, --quiet=false** Suppress the verbose output generated by the containers
* **--rm=true** Remove intermediate containers after a successful build
* **-t, --tag=""** Repository name (and optionally a tag) to be applied to the resulting image in case of success  

---

WordPresshttps://linux.cn/article-5560-1.html

http://www.cnblogs.com/ivictor/archive/2015/09/08/4791274.html

# Centos 7
Centos 6

root`uname -r`3.10
`yum update`


Docker
```
tee /etc/yum.repos.d/docker.repo <<-'EOF'
[dockerrepo]
name=Docker Repository
baseurl=https://yum.dockerproject.org/repo/main/centos/7/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://yum.dockerproject.org/gpg
EOF```


```
yum install docker-engine
systemctl enable docker.service
systemctl start docker```

# Ubuntu 14 && Ubuntu 16
root`uname -r`3.10

****`apt-get install docker docker.io -y`

****
1.GPG

```
apt-get update
apt-get install apt-transport-https ca-certificates
apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net:80 --recv-keys 58118E89F3A912897C070ADBF76221572C52609D```

2.**source****docker.list**
`vim /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list` ,
Trusty 14.04 (LTS)	`deb https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo ubuntu-trusty main`
Xenial 16.04 (LTS)	`deb https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo ubuntu-xenial main`

```
apt-get purge lxc-docker  #docker
apt-cache policy docker-engine #
```

3.Docker

```
apt-get update
apt-get install linux-image-extra-$(uname -r) linux-image-extra-virtual
#14.04dockerlinux-image-extra
apt-get install docker-engine
service docker start
docker run hello-world
```
---

# Mac
## 
pkgBoot2Docker-1.3.2.pkg
**https://github.com/boot2docker/osx-installer/releases/latest**


Boot2Docker:
```
boot2docker init
boot2docker start
export DOCKER_HOST=tcp://$(boot2docker ip 2>/dev/null):2375```

boot2docker stopboot2docker start
virtualBox


* 1.Docker for OS X Installer
* 2., VirtualBoxBoot2Docker
* 3.:

```
boot2docker stop
boot2docker download
boot2docker start```


## Brew
```
brew update
brew install docker
brew link docker
brew link boot2docker```
